title: Rp to another country
body:
Is it possible for me to send rp from euw server to North amerian server. if theres a way can u tell me how?
Thanks

replies.body: Currently, there's no method of transferring RP from one account to another.  It's also not possible right now to transfer RP cards intended from one region to another.  Your best bet would be to purchase RP on the intended account iteself, or get cards for that region.  Hope that helps!
